data.eml:eml: Revision of Sinonereis Wu & Sun, 1979 (Annelida: Nereididae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Víctor M. CONDE-VELA, Xuwen WU (2019): Revision of Sinonereis Wu & Sun, 1979 (Annelida: Nereididae). Zoosystema 41 (9): 151-161, DOI: 10.5252/zoosystema2019v4a9
